summary: Five children staying in their eccentric uncle's labyrinthine mansion for protection during World War I befriend a sand fairy who has the power to grant wishes.
cast: Tara Fitzgerald|Freddie Highmore|Alex Jennings|Jonathan Bailey|Jessica Claridge|Poppy Rogers|Alec Muggleton|Zak Muggleton|Zoë Wanamaker|Kenneth Branagh|Alexander Pownall|Eddie Izzard|Georgio Serafini|John Sessions|Kim Fenton|Norman Wisdom|Duncan Preston
title: 5 chicos & esto
